scripts.clean: rimraf screenshots videos mochawesome-report mochawesome-merged merged-report.json
scripts.test:chrome: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=chrome mocha
scripts.test:firefox: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=firefox mocha
scripts.test:edge: npm run clean && cross-env BROWSER=edge mocha
scripts.test:all: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run test:chrome" "npm run test:firefox" "npm run test:edge"
scripts.test:all:report: npm run test:all && npm run merge:reports && npm run generate:report
